Description: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

Name: Sweet Kiss
Description: Confuses opponent.

Name: Sweet Scent
Description: Lowers opponent's Evasiveness.

Name: Swift
Description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

Name: Switcheroo
Description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

Name: Swords Dance
Description: Sharply raises user's Attack.

Name: Synchronoise
Description: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

Name: Synthesis
Description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

Name: Tail Glow
Description: Drastically raises user's Special Attack.

Name: Tail Slap
Description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

Name: Tail Whip
Description: Lowers opponent's Defense.

Name: Tailwind
Description: Doubles Speed for 4 turns.

Name: Take Down
Description: User receives recoil damage.

Name: Take Heart
Description: Heals user's status conditions and raises its stats.

Name: Tar Shot
Description: Lowers the opponent's Speed and makes them weaker to Fire-type moves.

Name: Taunt
Description: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

Name: Tearful Look
Description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Name: Teatime
Description: Forces all Pokémon on the field to eat their berries.

Name: Techno Blast
Description: Type depends on the Drive being held.

Name: Tectonic Rage
Description: Ground type Z-Move.

Name: Teeter Dance
Description: Confuses all Pokémon.

Name: Telekinesis
Description: Ignores opponent's Evasiveness for three turns, add Ground immunity.

Name: Teleport
Description: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

Name: Tera Blast
Description: Changes type when the user has Terastallized.

Name: Terrain Pulse
Description: Type and power change depending on the Terrain in effect.

Name: Thief
Description: Also steals opponent's held item.

Name: Thousand Arrows
Description: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

Name: Thousand Waves
Description: Opponent cannot flee or switch.

Name: Thrash
Description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Name: Throat Chop
Description: Prevents use of sound moves for two turns.

Name: Thunder
Description: May paralyze opponent.

Name: Thunder Cage
Description: Deals damage and traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Thunder Fang
Description: May cause flinching and/or paralyze opponent.

Name: Thunder Punch
Description: May paralyze opponent.

Name: Thunder Shock
Description: May paralyze opponent.

Name: Thunder Wave
Description: Paralyzes opponent.

Name: Thunderbolt
Description: May paralyze opponent.

Name: Thunderous Kick
Description: Lowers opponent's Defense.

Name: Tickle
Description: Lowers opponent's Attack and Defense.

Name: Tidy Up
Description: Removes the effects of entry hazards and Substitute, and boosts user’s Attack and Speed.

Name: Topsy-Turvy
Description: Reverses stat changes of opponent.

Name: Torch Song
Description: Raises user's Special Attack.

Name: Torment
Description: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

Name: Toxic
Description: Badly poisons opponent.

Name: Toxic Spikes
Description: Poisons opponents when they switch into battle.

Name: Toxic Thread
Description: Poisons opponent and lowers its Speed.

Name: Trailblaze
Description: Raises user's Speed.

Name: Transform
Description: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

Name: Tri Attack
Description: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

Name: Trick
Description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

Name: Trick Room
Description: Slower Pokémon move first in the turn for 5 turns.

Name: Trick-or-Treat
Description: Adds Ghost type to opponent.

Name: Triple Arrows
Description: Raises critical hit ratio and lowers target's Defense.

Name: Triple Axel
Description: Attacks thrice with more power each time.

Name: Triple Dive
Description: Hits 3 times in a row.

Name: Triple Kick
Description: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

Name: Trop Kick
Description: Lowers opponent's Attack.

Name: Trump Card
Description: The lower the PP, the higher the power.

Name: Twin Beam
Description: Hits twice in one turn.

Name: Twineedle
Description: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

Name: Twinkle Tackle
Description: Fairy type Z-Move.

Name: Twister
Description: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

Name: U-turn
Description: User switches out immediately after attacking.

Name: Uproar
Description: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

Name: V-create
Description: Lowers user's Defense, Special Defense and Speed.

Name: Vacuum Wave
Description: User attacks first.

Name: Veevee Volley
Description: Power increases when player's bond is stronger.

Name: Venom Drench
Description: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.

Name: Venoshock
Description: Inflicts double damage if the target is poisoned.

Name: Victory Dance
Description: Raises Attack and Defense.

Name: Vital Throw
Description: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

Name: Volt Switch
Description: User must switch out after attacking.

Name: Volt Tackle
Description: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

Name: Wake-Up Slap
Description: Power doubles if opponent is asleep, but wakes it up.

Name: Water Pledge
Description: Added effects appear if preceded by Fire Pledge or succeeded by Grass Pledge.

Name: Water Pulse
Description: May confuse opponent.

Name: Water Shuriken
Description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

Name: Water Sport
Description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

Name: Water Spout
Description: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

Name: Waterfall
Description: May cause flinching.

Name: Wave Crash
Description: User receives recoil damage.

Name: Weather Ball
Description: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

Name: Whirlpool
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Name: Wicked Blow
Description: Always results in a critical hit and ignores stat changes.

Name: Wide Guard
Description: Protects the user's team from multi-target attacks.

Name: Wild Charge
Description: User receives recoil damage.

Name: Wildbolt Storm
Description: May paralyze target.

Name: Will-O-Wisp
Description: Burns opponent.

Name: Wish
Description: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

Name: Withdraw
Description: Raises user's Defense.

Name: Wonder Room
Description: Swaps every Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense for 5 turns.

Name: Wood Hammer
Description: User receives recoil damage.

Name: Work Up
Description: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

Name: Worry Seed
Description: Changes the opponent's Ability to Insomnia.

Name: Wrap
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Wring Out
Description: The higher the opponent's HP, the higher the damage.

Name: Yawn
Description: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.

Name: Zap Cannon
Description: Paralyzes opponent.

Name: Zen Headbutt
Description: May cause flinching.

Name: Zing Zap
Description: May cause flinching.

Name: Zippy Zap
Description: Always results in a critical hit.
